info.additionalInfo: Version 2.0 Change log: Unknown // Added arrows/buttons. 08/05/2016 // Reposted on new account. 10/06/2016 // Moved image hosting to Imgur. 11/06/2016 // Tidied up coding. 11/02/2017 // Minor fixes. 25/07/2017 // Tidied up coding and revamped images. 26/07/2017 // Fixed bug that caused part of the arrows to be cut off.
